caption:
Chicago! This Sunday, April 6, I will be in your city for the @chihumanities Spring 2025 Festival. I’ll be giving a reading then having a talk with my friend Bruce Lamont of Yakuza/Corrections House/ Pigface at @fitzgeraldsnightclub. This will be followed by a Q&A, there will be copies of my new book, Just Beyond the Light, at the venue, & yes, I will be signing books & taking photos afterwards & all that good stuff.
Tickets are available at the link IN MY BIO, or go to
CHICAGOHUMANITIES.ORG. See y’all there!
#drandallblythe #justbeyondthelight #chicagohumanitiesfestival #chicagohumanities
